pages.text: This section contains some armors that you can work towards in your adventures.

pages.title: Botania Armors
pages.text: Botania includes multipe tiers of armor. Terrasteel is the second best botania armor, and Alfsteel is the best. When equipped with the full set it will give you a bonus.

pages.title: Tinker's Armory
pages.text: Tinker's includes three sets: plate armor, traveller's armor, and slime armor. The different sets vary in the number of upgrade, defence, and utility slots. All armors can be upgraded.

pages.title: Netherite+
pages.text: Advanced Netherite includes new tiers of netherite armor that each give you an additial bonus the more upgraded the armor is.

pages.title: Mekasuit
pages.text: The most high tech of armor for the mekanists out there. Can be fitted with different upgrades.

pages.title: Mage Robes
pages.text: Ars Nouveau includes three tiers of mage robes. Each tier decreases mana cost of spells by incremental amounts.
